title: Start with a harm hypothesis
description: Filter engagements to a risk cohort (for example, election observers) and see where views concentrate.
query:
SELECT
  audience_country,
  SUM(total_views) AS total_views
FROM fact_engagement_details
WHERE risk_cohort = 'election_observer'
GROUP BY audience_country
ORDER BY total_views DESC;

title: Compare surfaces
description: Group by experience surface to see which platform areas drive reactions for different content types.
query:
SELECT
  experience_surface,
  SUM(total_reactions) AS total_reactions
FROM fact_engagement_details
GROUP BY experience_surface
ORDER BY total_reactions DESC;

title: Track enforcement
description: Join probabilistic risk scores to enforcement outcomes to understand how often high-risk content is actioned.
query:
SELECT
  d.risk_cohort,
  s.policy_label,
  COUNT(*) AS total_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN s.enforcement_action IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS actioned_items
FROM fact_engagement_details AS d
JOIN fact_content_policy_scores AS s ON d.content_id = s.content_id
GROUP BY d.risk_cohort, s.policy_label
ORDER BY actioned_items DESC;
